channel.title: Cursor on button
channel.description: What's the code to make the sprite change when you put your cursor on it? For example, the 'Play' button in the lobby/login interface on RuneScape.

item.title: Cursor on button
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

How can I make the close buttons change when your cursor is on it?

This is the close button/sprite that I want when your cursor isn’t on it

This is the close button I want when your cursor is on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cursor on button
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

gangsta tony:

What’s the code to make the sprite change when you put your cursor on it? For example, the ‘Play’ button in the lobby/login interface on RuneScape.

Probably have to mess with the mouseEntered/mouseMoved methods in the applet. Probably the latter because the interfaces aren’t actual AWT/Swing objects to they won’t fire the mouseEntered event. Unless it’s driven by coordinates…

Read full topic
